resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/106791</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>106791</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202565</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Statistics Project</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Statistik-Projekt</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Projet de Statistiques</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Projeto Dos Statistics</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Progetto Di Statistiche</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρόγραμμα στατιστικών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Proyecto De la Estadística</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Students collect numeric and non-numeric data. They are then expected to use the data collected to construct different types of graphs as well as finding central tendencies.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Mathematics and Statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kursteilnehmer sammeln die numerischen und 
non-numeric Daten. Sie werden dann erwartet, die Daten zu 
verwenden, die gesammelt werden, um unterschiedliche Typen aus 
Diagrammen sowie das Finden der zentralen Tendenzen zu konstruieren.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants rassemblent des données numériques
et non-numériques. On s'attend à ce qu'alors ils utilisent les
données rassemblées pour construire différents types avec des 
graphiques aussi bien que trouver des tendances centrales.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os estudantes coletam dados numéricos e 
non-numeric. Esperam-se então usar os dados coletados para 
construir tipos diferentes dos gráficos as.well.as encontrar 
tendências centrais.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Gli allievi raccolgono i dati numerici e non 
numerici. Allora si pensano che usino i dati raccolti per 
costruire i tipi differenti con grafici così come l'individuazione 
delle tendenze centrali.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι σπουδαστές συλλέγουν τα αριθμητικά και μη 
αριθμητικά στοιχεία. Αναμένονται έπειτα για να 
χρησιμοποιήσουν τα στοιχεία που συλλέγονται για να κατασκευάσουν 
τους διαφορετικούς τύπους γραφικών παραστάσεων καθώς επίσης και 
βρίσκοντας τις κεντρικές τάσεις.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los estudiantes recogen datos numéricos y no 
numéricos. Entonces se espera que utilicen los datos recogidos 
para construir diversos tipos de gráficos así como encontrar 
tendencias centrales.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mathematik und Statistiken</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mathématiques et statistiques</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Matemática e statistics</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Matematica e statistiche</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μαθηματικά και στατιστικές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Matemáticas y estadística</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>author</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
N:AUDREA SAUNDERS
FN:AUDREA SAUNDERS
VERSION:3.0
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770202565</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>106791</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/statistics-project</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
